name: Christmas Town Adventure
description:
Christmas Town Adventure is amazing adventure game for all ages.

It's amazing game with 100+ adventure levels with unique Christmas theme. It's amazing adventure game with few control like left, right, up, down, jump and shooting. Collect much of coins and powers.

How to Play:
=========
- Use button to control your characters.
- Used to move left, right and jump and fire button control.
- Find weapon in stone.
- Kill enemies by firing or jumping on their head.

Features:
=======
- Beautiful Christmas theme with Santa Characters.
- 100+ unique levels.
- Fun all ages.
- Addictive Game Play.
- Completed levels within time.
- Unlock the next level after finished the previous ones.

It's amazing game. So why are you waiting? Download Now.....
